summary: When a lovely woman and her new husband settle in an ancient mansion on the East coast, she discovers that he may want to kill her.
cast: Joan Bennett|Michael Redgrave|Anne Revere|Barbara O'Neil|Natalie Schafer|Paul Cavanagh|Anabel Shaw|Rosa Rey|James Seay|Mark Dennis|Robert Barber|Ray Beltram|Virginia Brissac|Ralph Brooks|Albert Cavens|Tom Chatterton|David Cota|Frank Dae|Harry Denny|Watson Downs|Danny Duncan|Robert Espinoza|Virginia Farmer|Paul Fierro|Herschel Graham|Jesse Graves|Marie Harmon|Maria Haro|Donald Kerr|Nolan Leary|Ralph Littlefield|Donna Martell|Hans Moebus|Kay Morley|Frank O'Connor|Bob Reeves|Pedro Regas|Peggy Remington|Julian Rivero|Tony Rodriquez|Paul Scardon|Houseley Stevenson|Wayne C. Treadway|Lucio Villegas|Eddy Waller|Crane Whitley
title: Secreto tras la puerta
